name: H.B. Fuller Company
description: H.B. Fuller Company is a global leader in adhesive technologies, providing innovative solutions for a wide range of industries. Founded in 1887 and headquartered in St. Paul, Minnesota, H.B. Fuller has over 130 years of experience in developing high-performance adhesives, sealants, and coatings. The company serves various sectors, including packaging, construction, woodworking, electronics, and automotive, delivering products that enhance productivity, efficiency, and sustainability. H.B. Fuller is committed to innovation, investing significantly in research and development to create advanced adhesive solutions that meet the ever-evolving needs of its customers. The company’s portfolio includes well-known brands such as Advantra, PVA, and Lattimer, which are recognized for their quality and reliability. H.B. Fuller is also focused on sustainability, striving to reduce its environmental impact through the development of environmentally friendly products and processes. The company operates in more than 40 countries, ensuring a global reach while maintaining a local presence to better serve its customers. With a mission to be the best adhesive partner for its customers, H.B. Fuller continues to lead the market through its commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability.
